content.raw:
this causes a [build error](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/166/)
~~~
gazebo/gui/GLWidget.cc:898:17: error: reinterpret_cast from 'WId' (aka 'long') to 'uint64_t' (aka 'unsigned long long') is not allowed 
  ogreHandle << reinterpret_cast<uint64_t>(this->winId());                                                                   
                ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~                                                                    
~~~
